title: My 8 year old son did this............ :)
body: My 8 year old son is absolutely obsessed with LOL and even has an account himself (he only plays bot games and is never allowed on the chat). He has come up with this idea of a skin for Garen (his favorite champion) and has asked me to share this with RIOT. Hope you all get as much fun from reading it as I did :)

replies.body: :o Yes pls!
Make it so! XD
ENGAGE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiSn2JuDQSc
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/264/241/9e9.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zOWXA5Zj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-31T16:04:47.322+0000)
>
> http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/264/241/9e9.gif

Words taken right out of my mouth :)
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x2WAYH16i7U/UkyQV43ueCI/AAAAAAAADCw/XZtjFOWqIuA/s1600/FinShaggy+%2813%29.jpg

Dear Robert,

your idea for 'Universe Garen' is astro-nomical! I like the way you thought about his abilities and how they could be incorporated into the theme of Space Exploration, particularly the ultimate where a whole Satellite falls on your opponent. Did you have trouble deciding what to make his sword? We did when we tried to think of what to make Astro-nautilus' anchor.

The description of Garen's death animation is also really cool; that's a nice touch that really shows you're imagining the whole package. If you feel like taking your idea further you could describe a custom recall and some lines for Universe Garen to say. You could even describe a scene for the splash art to really round things out.

I'll show your idea to everyone on the skins team tomorrow, we can't promise that it will be made into a skin for the game but I'm sure they will really enjoy your work. Keep a hold of the original design too; I'm 32 now and I wish I still had some of my video game drawings from when I was younger.

Thanks so much for playing LoL and taking the time to come up with a skin concept. Your concept art made my day >:D

-Kindlejack
Don't just "show" the skins team. Burst down the door and exclaim, "I HAVE THE BEST IDEA FOR A SKIN THAT HAS BEEN EVER SET ON THIS TABLE." You gotta be aggressive.
You guy's would definitely make a child's day if you turn it into a skin.

Hi Kindlejack,

This is Robert. I really do appreciate what you said about my skin idea. I agree with all the things I have missed. Next time I make a design I will put them in. 

No I didn't have trouble deciding what to make his sword. I always knew it would be a satelite piece.

For the recall a rocket comes down and Garen gets in and flies back to base and he can say "I'm outta this world". His splash art is Garen spacewalking on the moon.

Did the skin team like my idea?

Thank you for your comment.

Robert :)

Thanks for replying,

YES the skins team really like your idea! One of the artists only plays Garen and he thinks it suits him perfectly. We usually plan skins a long time in advance (sometimes up to a year ahead of release) but the next time we are coming up with ideas for a Garen skin I will make sure 'Universe Garen' is one pf the candidates.

Great job and thanks for playing League of Legends.

-Kindlejack >:D
The fact that one of the artists replied makes me happy ;3

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zOWXA5Zj,comment-id=002b,timestamp=2015-06-01T05:52:15.107+0000)

> 
> your idea for 'Universe Garen' is astro-nomical! I like the way you thought about his abilities and how they could be incorporated into the theme of Space Exploration, particularly the ultimate where a whole Satellite falls on your opponent. Did you have trouble deciding what to make his sword? We did when we tried to think of what to make Astro-nautilus' anchor.

> The description of Garen's death animation is also really cool; that's a nice touch that really shows you're imagining the whole package. If you feel like taking your idea further you could describe a custom recall and some lines for Universe Garen to say. You could even describe a scene for the splash art to really round things out.
> 
> I'll show your idea to everyone on the skins team tomorrow, we can't promise that it will be made into a skin for the game but I'm sure they will really enjoy your work. Keep a hold of the original design too; I'm 32 now and I wish I still had some of my video game drawings from when I was younger.
> 
> Thanks so much for playing LoL and taking the time to come up with a skin concept. Your concept art made my day >:D
> 
> -Kindlejack

Robert is with his Dad for a couple of days, but as soon as he is back home I will get him to have a read and answer your questions.
Tell your son that while I don't play Garen, this skin - if made - very well might force me to reconsider.

I chuckled at "universe GARON"

...Can we have a buzz lightyear Garen skin?
We _do_ need more astronaut skins IMO.
Yes,enough of the desert skins.Let's go to SPACE!!!

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/461/403/6fc.gif

But really though, 8 years old is probably a little too young to be playing LoL, with all things considered.
Yeah he is young, but hes mature for his age and he only plays bot games and is never allowed to chat. He never gets to see the toxic side of league and he has a great time so I don't see the harm :)

> [{quoted}](name=Ta4ri,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zOWXA5Zj,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-05-31T17:52:51.189+0000)
>
> Yeah he is young, but hes mature for his age and he only plays bot games and is never allowed to chat. He never gets to see the toxic side of league and he has a great time so I don't see the harm :)

Wtf you stop him from chatting?

> [{quoted}](name=BuddyRydell14,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zOWXA5Zj,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2015-05-31T19:12:11.840+0000)
>
> Wtf

I think they're afraid of people like you...
Teaching him intense profanity at age 8.

> [{quoted}](name=MrYorky,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zOWXA5Zj,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-31T20:18:16.232+0000)
>
> I think they're afraid of people like you...
> Teaching him intense profanity at age 8.

No, because they should know that the eff word is not a bad word.  It is just sound.
You are basically saying that swear words don't exist. Children shouldn't be exposed to extreme language. Especially parents that care about their children. Your logic is flawed in many ways.

For one, they should know the difference between right and wrong not use those words.

For two, it sort of helps them learn the difference. Online interactions can teach several social skills like dealing with dumbasses.

I'd hardly say people in this game know the difference themselves. A lot of times they'll just swear and use profanity for no reason.

And if you were to deal with dumbasses the same way most people do in league, you'd likely be beaten into the next nationality.

To be honest everyone the swearing isn't the reason I keep him off the chat. There is a filter for the bad words that works just fine. I want to keep him off the chat so he doesn't have someone wish bad things to him and his family. That is what I am protecting him from. He still communicates with his team when playing Co-Op vs AI as we have taught him the ping system. He knows how to tell his team he is on his way and that enemies are missing etc.... It is drummed into him how bad toxic behavior is and I don't want him exposed to the malicious side of the player base until he is ready.

> [{quoted}](name=DrinkPotatoJuice,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zOWXA5Zj,comment-id=000200010000000000000001,timestamp=2015-05-31T22:06:23.490+0000)
>
> You are basically saying that swear words don't exist. Children shouldn't be exposed to extreme language. Especially parents that care about their children. Your logic is flawed in many ways.

No if the world is designed to be peaceful there shouldn't be any limits on what anything can do.  I get that corrupt tones plague English but it doesn't mean people are always using those tones when swearing.  The kid can make his own future, he doesn't need a random girl and guy stopping him from talking.

Random girl and guy? Are you referring to his parents as a random girl and guy? 

Profanity shouldn't be taught to young children so they don't become like you. Unable to talk without swearing unless they try really hard. 

The guy is doing the right thing teaching his son.
Soon the 8 year old would become a challenger and would hit Esports. The more time you put into the game the more you learn things.

> [{quoted}](name=GamerGoodies,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zOWXA5Zj,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-31T16:55:22.630+0000)
>
> Soon the 8 year old would become a challenger and would hit Esports. The more time you put into the game the more you learn things.

A child going into Esport scene is just not a great idea with everything considered.

That's why LCS has an age restriction.
Lcs shouldn't have an age restriction. Their are people in so many ages that can be quite good at league :Y

it's no so much their skill at the game; it's because LCS has a lot of travel involved and they have to be responsible with their time management and junk. Thats why there's an age limit of a (assumed) responsible age :o
I guess a 24 year old fella like me won't have a lick of a chance to get into the LCS. ;w;

A kid that actually knows how to write in cursive

Holy crap, he must be smart
Bruh I asked my parents to teach me cursive in grade 1, and now both ways of my writing is messy because of it.
Cursive is the only way they tought us to write. You don't print with a pen.

So I'm not a professional artist, and I tried to punch this out in about 5 minutes, but I took a shot in the dark at what it might look like.

Basing it mostly off of Galactic Renekton, Buzz Lightyear, and Steel Legion Garen.. Here's my drawing (sorry for horrific handwriting):
http://i.imgur.com/p6PFwlZ.jpg
ho that is so cute :3
I love how his E is called "SPINNING WORLD" and its literally just the earth spinning in motion.

That is cute c: {{champion:67}}
that google link vomit makes my brain hurt
http://media.giphy.com/media/KU9xntRQg8nQc/giphy.gif

as soon as I saw this.
http://i.imgur.com/XSwGW1C.gif

 10/10 would love to get a satellite dropped on me by Garen in game.
So cute.  I remember the days that I was trying to design castles in minecraft.  I like how he includes the RP cost too.  Getting the important things down......
It would be an honor to get to play with him, I wouldn't even care that i was playing with bots! Such creativity, and I love that you control his environment to play, you are parenting right!
This skin is genius!! Yet I think the w should be Atmospheric Protection and the e should be Orbit otherwise it's super cool dude!
Maybe instead call his W " O-Zone Layer"

I'd buy it simply for the reason behind the creation of the skin. He clearly put a lot of thought into it and even tried to make it as neat as possible for us.
